name: The British Library Simulator
description:
If you miss wandering around the British Library, here is a (very little) simulator of the St Pancras building in London, UK. 

Virtual readers are out and about and very eager to share British Library facts with you.

Links mentioned in the game:

  • Emerging Formats: https://www.bl.uk/projects/emerging-formats
  • The British Library: Our Story: https://www.bl.uk/about-us/our-story/
  • The UK Web Archive: https://www.webarchive.org.uk
  • British Library Sounds: https://sounds.bl.uk
  • The Sound Gallery: https://www.bl.uk/events/sound-gallery
